pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fit Mixture Regression Models for Left-Truncated and Interval- Censored Data // Fit mixture regression models with nonsusceptibility/cure for left-truncated and interval-censored (LTIC) data (see Chen et al. (2013) doi:10.1002/sim.5845). This package also provides the nonparametric maximum likelihood estimator (NPMLE) for the survival/event curves with LTIC data.
